Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ocellatin-PT3 (natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: Skin Secretion, dorsal,Leptodactylus pustulatus, South America

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of THE PEPTIDE shows 84% similarity toOcellatin-PT4. Originally discovered in 2015, it has leishmanicidal activity (IC50 13.4 uM)(Oliveira M et al., 2016).

Literature Information.Title: Characterization and Biological Activities of Ocellatin Peptides from the Skin Secretion of the Frog Leptodactylus pustulatus
